Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_itemtype_xpropertydefinition_related_id_source_id] ON [innovator].[ITEMTYPE_XPROPERTYDEFINITION] ( [RELATED_ID] ASC, [SOURCE_ID] ASC ) INCLUDE ( [VALUE_PERMISSION_ID], [DEFINE_PERMISSION_ID] ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
Item.name: IX_itemtype_xpropertydefinition_related_id_source_id
